food.question: I am long and yellow, monkeys love to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys are known for eating me.
💛 I'm a fruit that is a bright color.
🍌 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I come from a farm animal.
🥛 I am often served cold.
🥣 I am a liquid that is good for your bones.

food.question: I am round and red, sometimes green. I grow on trees and keep doctors away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🍎 I am a healthy snack.
🩺 People say one a day keeps the doctor away.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have many layers.
😭 I can make your eyes water.
🍔 I am often chopped and added to burgers or salads.

food.question: I am a grain that is often served with sauce. I can be long, short, or shaped like a shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am often served at Italian restaurants.
🌾 I am made from wheat.
🍅 I taste great with tomato sauce.

food.question: I am a sweet treat made with flour, sugar, and eggs. People celebrate birthdays with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🎂 I am often decorated with frosting.
🕯️ People put candles on me.
🥳 You eat me at a party!

food.question: I am a yellow fruit with a bumpy skin. I taste sour and sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I grow in warm places.
🌴 I have a crown of leaves.
🍕 Some people like me on pizza!

food.question: I am a vegetable that is orange, long, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am good for your eyes.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.
🥗 You can eat me raw or cooked.

food.question: I am made from potatoes, shaped like a stick, and fried. I am a popular side dish with burgers. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am often served with ketchup.
🥔 My main ingredient grows underground.
🍔 I am a popular food to eat with a burger.

food.question: I am a cold, sweet treat that comes in many flavors. I am often eaten in a cone or a cup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt quickly in the sun.
🍨 People often put sprinkles on me.
🌈 I come in many different colors.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I might build a web for all. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ Some people are scared of me!
🕷️ I am not an ant or a bee.
🎵 I spin a sticky trap, you see.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and I'm considered good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I'm a beetle, small and round.
⚫ I have spots all over me.
🌱 You can find me on a leaf, maybe.

bug.question: I buzz around flowers and make sweet honey. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I love to collect nectar.
💛 I live in a hive with lots of friends.
🐝 I have a stinger, so be careful!

bug.question: I march in a line and carry food back home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very strong for my size.
🏡 We live in colonies with queens and workers.
🪨 You can often find us near the ground or under rocks.

bug.question: I jump very high and eat green plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green in color.
🦗 I can make a chirping sound.
🌿 I have long legs for leaping.

bug.question: I flap my colorful wings. First a crawling larva, then a beautiful thing. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change.
🌈 I am known for my beautiful colors.
🦋 I start as a caterpillar.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing abdomen. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the dark.
🔦 I'm also called a lightning bug.
🌙 You can see me best on summer nights.

bug.question: I love to bite and drink your blood, especially at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I leave itchy bumps behind.
🩸 Only the females bite!
🌃 You can hear me buzzing around your ear.

bug.question: I can walk on water and have big eyes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am very light.
👀 I hunt for other bugs.
⛸️ It looks like I am skating!

bug.question: I make a loud noise when summer is hot, and hidden well am I often not. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a buzzing sound, but I'm not a bee.
🌳 You can usually find me in trees.
☀️ My sound is loudest on warm days.
